title: Russia Says It Will End Space Station Collaboration With U.S.
teaser: With the U.S. imposing sanctions on Russia over Ukraine, what happens to U.S. and Russian co-operation in space? NPR's Scott Simon speaks to reporter Geoff Brumfiel about the future of the program.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
